EXTRA_TEXT: cards, you'll need to lay low and won't be able to draw more.

TEXT: Click this to review information at any time.

EXTRA_TEXT: #yAtlas has no #yEnergy - changes to #yEnergy will create or #yDevour cards in the #yExhaust #yPile instead. If you don't have enough cards to #yDevour, gain #rRavenous equal to what you couldn't pay.

#yFood cards begin combat #yExhausted, and #ySeconds cards will be added back to the hand a limited number of times when they're #yDevoured. NL NL Your deck starts with #b10 #yRations with the #yFood tag.
At the start of the turn #rRavenous will cause you to #rlose #rHP, then attempt to #yDevour cards in the #yExhaust #yPile to reduce itself.
#yX-Cost Cards have a displayed #yCap on #bX that shows how much they'll play for. NL NL #yRelics that normally change #bMaximum #bEnergy will change the cap for #yX-Cost cards by the same amount.
#yRisk is the limit to the number of cards you can draw beyond your #yStarting #yHand each turn, displayed where the #yEnergy #yOrb would be. NL NL It #yresets at the end of each turn.
